change_reason: Initial weight configuration per Jay architecture spec

notes.skill_match: Percentage of MUST_HAVE skills consultant possesses
notes.experience_alignment: Absolute difference between required years and consultant years
notes.posting_freshness: Days since job was posted (fresher is better)
notes.applicant_volume: Number of applicants (fewer = less competition, better signal)
notes.vendor_tier: 1=Top tier (Insight Global, Robert Half, TEKsystems, etc), 2=Regional, 3=Body shop, unknown=Needs research
notes.rate_compatibility: Percentage difference between consultant rate and job target rate
notes.red_flags_penalty: Each red flag (contradictory tech, unrealistic requirements, etc) reduces score by 1 point
